tcutility.cli_scripts package#

Submodules#

tcutility.cli_scripts.cite module#

Module containing functions for generating citations

class Docx(file='test.docx', overwrite=False)[source]#

Bases: object

Small class that handles writing to a docx file. This should and will be moved to its own module in TCutility soon.

write_paragraph(text, alignment=WD_PARAGRAPH_ALIGNMENT.LEFT)[source]#

Write a piece of text as a pragraph to this Docx file. This function will parse any HTML that is given in the text. E.g. you can use the <b></b> tags to make a piece of text bold.

open()[source]#

Open this file in Word.

format_paragraph(dois, style)[source]#

tcutility.cli_scripts.geo module#

Module containing functions for calculating geometrical parameters for molecules

Bases: StrEnum

Enum class for geometric parameters
